lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Finance minister Jaime Ongpin did not refer to the prepayments at a news conference he held in New York on Friday to announce the rescheduling agreement.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Bankers could not back down either because they would have had to sacrifice millions of dollars in profits and may have thrown the door open to other debtors, notably Argentina and Brazil, to claim even finer spreads than Mexico's.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Bankers said they insisted on the principal repayments so that they could justify a margin of 7/8 pct by drawing a direct parallel between the Philippines and Venezuela, which won a 7/8 pct spread on a 21 billion dlr debt rescheduling package last month.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Finance minister Jaime Ongpin did not refer to the prepayments at a news conference he held in New York on Friday to announce the rescheduling agreement.

lst.str: Bankers could not back down either because they would have had to sacrifice millions of dollars in profits and may have thrown the door open to other debtors, notably Argentina and Brazil, to claim even finer spreads than Mexico's.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Bankers said they insisted on the principal repayments so that they could justify a margin of 7/8 pct by drawing a direct parallel between the Philippines and Venezuela, which won a 7/8 pct spread on a 21 billion dlr debt rescheduling package last month.
